name: Volume 1 - Individual Copies
description:
TRY US ON FOR SIZE!

100% Post Consumer Recycled Stock, Uncoated
Full Colour, Offset, Vegetable Based Ink
Perfect Bound

LIMITED EDITIONS

What's In Store - ISSUE 7

Our first Entertaining Issue, Featuring:
William & Susan Brinson
Shrimpton Couture
The Organic Kitchen - Relaxed Good Taste

To name but a few....

NOTE - For domestic orders, taxes will apply according to your destination and will be added upon checkout. For International orders, no taxes apply.

If purchasing as a gift, you will have an opportunity to add a) custom note to the recipient and b) an alternate address (under NOTE TO SELLER) in final stages of checkout.

Thank you!

name: Leaf Identification Guide
description:
Illustrated Leaf Identification Guide from Pure Green Magazine - Issue 6.

Paper dimensions: 13" x 19", Minimum matte dimensions recommended: 10.5" x 15"
Printed on high quality 100% recycled matte paper, using archival inks. 
Ships rolled.

Custom sizing available, please inquire via info@puregreenmag.com
